thread.title: Flueid Software Corp. Names Eric D. Swenson Chairman of the Board

author: cnbc.com
title: Flueid Software Corp. Names Eric D. Swenson Chairman of the Board

organizations.name: joins board of strategic business and technology software solutions firm

text:
Eric D. Swenson, Former Chairman of Experience1, Inc. and Co-Chief Operating Officer, Lender Processing Services, Joins Board of Strategic Business and Technology Software Solutions Firm for the Real Estate, Lending and Insurance Industries
AUSTIN, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Flueid Software Corporation, a strategic software development and business solutions firm, today announced that Eric Swenson has become the Company’s Chairman of the Board. Swenson’s appointment brings the Company experienced thought-leadership by one of the nation’s most seasoned real estate, title insurance, and mortgage industry trailblazers.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180523005341/en/
During his recent tenure as Chairman of the Board of Experience1, Inc., holding company for Title365 Company, a leading nationwide provider of title insurance and escrow services, and technology subsidiaries X1 Labs and X1 Analytics, Swenson was instrumental in the Company’s strategic business expansion which ultimately lead to its acquisition by Solutionstar Holdings (now Xome Inc.), an indirect wholly-owned subsidiary of Nationstar Mortgage Holdings (NYSE: NSM). Prior to that, Swenson was Co-Chief Operating Officer of Lender Processing Services, Inc. (NYSE: LPS), a multi-billion-dollar technology and services provider to the mortgage industry. He led the Company’s Origination, Default and Mortgage Information and Data businesses, including its title insurance operations. Swenson also held the position of Executive Vice President of Fidelity National Information Services, Inc. (FIS: NYSE), and Division President of the Mortgage Information and Outsourcing Businesses.
Flueid Software Corporation CEO Peter Bowman commented, “The Flueid team couldn’t be happier about Eric Swenson joining us as our chairman. He is a widely respected and proven leader with extensive business expertise, a complete understanding of the mortgage technology industry, and strong business development and operations skills. As Chairman of Flueid, I know Eric will positively impact our profitability targets, the growth of our client base, and the expansion into additional strategic markets because he brings with him a wealth of business advice and influence.”
Swenson’s professional experience covers a span of more than three decades and a wide array of businesses from entrepreneurial successes with start-up companies to prominent real estate and mortgage industry positions. He joined Fidelity National Financial (NYSE: FNF) in March of 2000 when FNF purchased Chicago Title Insurance Company where Swenson was EVP of the Southern California Region. During his tenure at FNF, Swenson held several executive positions including President and COO of Fidelity National Information Solutions (NASDAQ: FNIS), and Director of Financial Service Solutions, Inc., a 50/50 Joint Venture between FNF and Bank of America.
“The real estate, lending and insurance industries all have risks that are ever-changing as closing practices and requirements evolve which is why the inevitable adoption of new technologies will greatly impact how business is conducted,” said Swenson. “I am excited to work with the industry innovators at Flueid who envision these new opportunities on the horizon and are building solutions using technologies, like blockchain and artificial intelligence, that will disrupt how the real estate closing process is done today.”
About Flueid Software Corporation
Employing modern technologies, Flueid Software Corporation is on a mission to fundamentally change how the traditional real estate transaction closing process works. Our goal is not to eliminate critical functions, but to enhance them by making them smarter, which ultimately reduces scope and cost. Working with major partners, Flueid has already developed key solutions in this respect that improve data management, deliver the right information at the right time, and optimize business processes in support of this goal. With broad strategic, design, technology and operational experience in the real estate, lending and insurance industries, we have created foundational solutions for both internal use as well as for Fortune 500 organizations and start-ups in business-critical areas. For more information, please visit www.flueid.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180523005341/en/
